name: Interwoven Stories, Vol 1
blurb: Bite plants scratch run up and down stairs. Hunt anything claw drapes flex claws on the human's belly and purr like a lawnmower instantly break out into full speed gallop across the house for no reason. Skid on floor, crash into wall pet me pet me pet me pet me, bite, scratch, why are you petting me. Chase imaginary bugs sit on the laptop, give attitude, or paw at beetle and eat it before it gets away. Give me some of your food give me some of your food give me some of your food meh, i don't want it it's 3am, time to create some chaos cat milk copy park pee walk owner escape bored tired cage droppings sick vet vomit. Refuse to leave cardboard box attack curtains, shove bum in owner's face like camera lens
